abstract.t: This RFC contains a proposal for a design of a (partially) automated test framework. The design was inspired by Xtreme programming, design by contract and the jUnit testing framework. The ideas are slightly adapted to make it more suitable for the Xaraya System.
Finally a not so real world example is given to explain the workings of the system.
The RFC has no content yet, the number is reserved for it.
